.. currentmodule:: brite_etl.core.io.frame_sources


Classes
=======

- :py:class:`BriteDataSource`:
  Use BriteDataFrame or PreparedDataFrame to fetch dataframes

- :py:class:`CsvSource`:
  Use pandas.read_csv() to fetch dataframes
